thread.title: Suburban NY man faces murder charge in 17-month-old's death
thread.title_full: Suburban NY man faces murder charge in 17-month-old's death - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Suburban NY man faces murder charge in 17-month-old's death
text:
MINEOLA, N.Y. (AP) - A suburban New York man is being held on $20 million bond after police say he fatally beat his girlfriend's infant son.
Lord Pardo pleaded not guilty Tuesday to a murder charge in the death of 17-month-old Mason Robinson. His attorney, Meir Moza, vehemently denied his client killed the child.
Police say the 26-year-old factory worker was caring for the toddler on Sunday afternoon at his home in Uniondale when the child was injured.
He was taken to a hospital, where authorities found the boy had suffered a lacerated liver and lungs and fractured skull and ribs. Prosecutors said the injuries came from multiple blows.
Pardo's attorney said the child was jumping on a bed when he fell and was injured.
This story was corrected to show that incident happened at suspect's home, not girlfriend's apartment.
